DOC.brief_summary: SHIFT-2 national , multi-center , non-randomized , open label trial aflibercept patient wet age relate macular degeneration incomplete response routineranibizumab treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Aflibercept Wet Age Related Macular Degeneration Patients With Incomplete Response Routine Ranibizumab Injections
